boardgame.name: GOSU
boardgame.description: In a fantasy world dominated by goblins, when the blood moon rises in the sky, a new war begins and new warlords raise their armies._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;GOSU plays like a hybrid of Race for the Galaxy and Magic: The Gathering with each player trying to recruit an army of goblins made up of soldiers, heroes, magicians, and other classes _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; then swing it into action against the other players. Five clans of goblins are represented on the game cards, with goblins in one of three ranks. To build an army, a player must first recruit level I goblins, then build on those goblins with level II and finally level III. Those higher level goblins can be played only if a lower level goblin is of the same clan, and since goblins of the same clan have similar abilities or powers that mesh well, players tend to specialize in who they recruit to their ranks._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each turn, a player can play a new goblin, activate a goblin, draw cards, or pass. To activate a goblin or draw cards, players need to spend 1-2 activation tokens, with them having only two at the start of each battle. Many goblins have special powers that come into play when they're recruited, attacked, removed from play, placed with other goblins, and so on._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Once all players have passed, the player with the most powerful army wins the battle. Players keep cards in hand from one battle to the next, so laying out all your forces at once can leave you with little to do but get hit in later battles. The first player to win three battles wins the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Reimplemented as:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; GOSU 2: Tactics_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: ET42: Innovando en Verano y las TDN 2012

Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups

Asmodée (ASM GOSU01) The Goblins hordes are on the warpath! GOSU lets you build your very own goblin army, then face off against other goblin warlords. Discover powerful combos and unleash your horde on your opponents! Trap and destroy enemy goblins, while mutating your less useful goblins into more powerful units. GOSU has strategy, tactics, and a big heap of fun.
English/French version.

Gosu - New, In shrinkwrap. Payment: PayPal, Money Order, Old fashioned Cash Shipping: You pay actual cost! *No goofy math!* Most games cost $8 (or less) to $12 to ship in the US. We will always use the cheapest/fastest method to get you your games. Generally, this will be FedEx Home Delivery or USPS Priority Mail. In the case of large games, the cheapest method may be USPS Parcel Post. If this is the case, we will give you the option of a faster method of shipping. YES! You can combine items! Order multiple games and we will combine shipping costs. You STILL only have to pay for the actual shipping cost! (W00t!)
